Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: A roundup of what the people have been talking about lately. The Northern Territory Government plans for a new water source. Federal Treasurer Jim Chalmers shakes things up with the RBA’s leadership; announcing the appointment of two new members. The New South Wales Treasurer reveals a $7 billion shortfall as he prepares to release the state’s budget. A local council has dropped the tenant tax angering some community members. The airport rail link and recently paused arouse disappointment from council members in Melbourne's north-west. The RBA has reviewed 51 recommendations welcoming the changes.
